task.title: How to start coding in Scratch
task.shortdesc: Easy steps to guide you in building your scratch project.

taskbody.context: Here you will learn how to use the code blocks available in the Scatch interface.

step.cmd: Select a block of code from left side code palette.
Drag and drop it in the coding area, the middle section.
Click the green flag on the top right hand side.

taskbody.result: You have created your first program.
